ddm.agents

Class ManagerAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jade.core.Agent
      • ddm.agents.ManagerAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jade.core.TimerListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class ManagerAgent
extends jade.core.Agent
    Author:
    jordi Corbilla Manager agent class. This class creates all defined classifiers and deals with the communications with each individual instance. Send the data to classify and produces the output response.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
